monogr.title: Dionysii Halicarnasei Antiquitatum Romanarum quae supersunt, Vol II
monogr.author: Dionysius of Halicarnassus

p.#text:
basileu\s me\n dh\ *tarku/nios ou) mikrw=n ou)d' o)li/gwn
*(rwmai/ois a)gaqw=n ai)/tios geno/menos, o)ktw\ kai\
tria/konta e)/th th\n a)rxh\n katasxw\n ou(/tw teleuta=| ui(wnou/s
te du/o katalipw\n nhpi/sus kai\ du/o qugate/ras
a)ndra/sin h)/dh sunoikou/sas. dia/doxos de\ th=s h(gemoni/as 
o( gambro\s au)tou= gi/netai *tu/llios e)niautw=| teta/rtw|
th=s penthkosth=s o)lumpia/dos, h(\n e)ni/ka sta/dion *)epiteli/dhs
*la/kwn a)/rxontos *)aqh/nhsin *)arxestrati/dou:

peri\ ou(= kairo\s h)/dh le/gein, a(\ kat' a)rxa\s pareli/pomen,
e)c w(=n te gone/wn e)/fu kai\ ti/nas a)pedei/cato pra/ceis
i)diw/ths w)\n e)/ti kai\ pri\n e)pi\ th\n dunastei/an parelqei=n.
ta\ me\n ou)=n peri\ tou= ge/nous au)tou= lego/mena, oi(=s ma/list'
e)/gwge sugkatati/qemai, toiau=t' e)sti/n. e)n *korniko/lw|
po/lei tou= *lati/nwn e)/qnous a)nh/r tis e)k tou= basilei/ou
ge/nous *tu/llios o)/noma gunaiki\ sunh=n *)okrisi/a|
kalli/sth| te kai\ swfronesta/th| tw=n e)n *korniko/lw|
gunaikw=n. au)to\s me\n ou)=n o( *tu/llios, o(/q' h( po/lis u(po\
*(rwmai/wn katelamba/neto, maxo/menos a)poqnh/skei, th\n 
d' *)okrisi/an e)gku/mona ou)=san e)cai/reton e)k tw=n lafu/rwn
lamba/nei *tarku/nios o( basileu\s kai\ di/dwsi dwrea\n
th=| e(autou= gunaiki/. maqou=sa d' e)kei/nh pa/nta ta\
peri\ th\n a)/nqrwpon ou) polloi=s xro/nois u(/steron e)leuqe/ran
au)th\n a)fi/hsi kai\ pasw=n ma/lista gunaikw=n
a)spazome/nh te kai\ timw=sa diete/lesen. e)k tau/ths gi/netai
th=s *)okrisi/as e)/ti douleuou/shs paidi/on, w(=| ti/qetai
trafe/nti h( mh/thr to\ me\n i)/dio/n te kai\ suggeniko\n
o)/noma *tu/llion e)pi\ tou= patro/s, to\ de\ koino\n kai\
proshgoriko\n *serou/ion e)pi\ th=s i)di/as tu/xhs, o(/ti douleu/ousa
e)/teken au)to/n. ei)/h d' a)\n o( *serou/ios ei)s th\n
*(ellhnikh\n dia/lekton metabibazo/menos *dou/lios.

fe/retai de/ tis e)n tai=s e)pixwri/ois a)nagrafai=s
 e(/teros u(pe\r th=s gene/sews au)tou= lo/gos e)pi\ to\
muqw=des e)cai/rwn ta\ peri\ au)to/n, o(\n e)n pollai=s *(rwmai+kai=s

i(stori/ais eu(/romen, ei) qeoi=s te kai\ dai/mosi
le/gesqai fi/los toiou=tos: ai(/tines a)po\ th=s e(sti/as tw=n
basilei/wn, e)f' h(=s a)/llas te *(rwmai=oi suntelou=sin i(erourgi/as
kai\ ta\s a)po\ tw=n dei/pnwn a)parxa\s a(gi/zousin,
u(pe\r tou= puro\s a)nasxei=n le/gousin ai)doi=on a)ndro/s. 
tou=to de\ qea/sasqai th\n *)okrisi/an prw/thn fe/rousan
tou\s ei)wqo/tas pela/nous e)pi\ to\ pu=r kai\ au)ti/ka pro\s
tou\s basilei=s e)lqou=san ei)pei=n. to\n me\n ou)=n *tarku/nion 
a)kou/santa/ te kai\ meta\ tau=t' i)do/nta to\ te/ras e)n qau/mati
gene/sqai, th\n de\ *tanakuli/da ta/ t' a)/lla sofh\n 
ou)=san kai\ dh\ kai\ ta\ mantika\ ou)deno\s xei=ron *turrhnw=n
e)pistame/nhn ei)pei=n pro\s au)to/n, o(/ti ge/nos a)po\
th=s e(sti/as th=s basilei/ou pe/prwtai gene/sqai krei=tton
h)\ kata\ th\n a)nqrwpei/an fu/sin e)k th=s mixqei/shs tw=|
fa/smati gunaiko/s. ta\ d' au)ta\ kai\ tw=n a)/llwn teratosko/pwn 
a)pofhname/nwn do/cai tw=| basilei= th\n *)okrisi/an,
h(=| prw/th| e)fa/nh to\ te/ras, ei)s o(mili/an au)tw=| sunelqei=n:
kai\ meta\ tou=to th\n gunai=ka kosmhsame/nhn, oi(=s
e)/qos e)sti\ kosmei=sqai ta\s gamoume/nas, katakleisqh=nai
mo/nhn ei)s to\n oi)=kon, e)n w(=| to\ te/ras w)/fqh. mixqe/ntos 
dh/ tinos au)th=| qew=n h)\ daimo/nwn kai\ meta\ th\n mi/cin
a)fanisqe/ntos ei)/q' *(hfai/stou kaqa/per oi)/ontai/ tines
ei)/te tou= kat' oi)ki/an h(/rwos, e)gku/mona gene/sqai kai\
tekei=n to\n *tu/llion e)n toi=s kaqh/kousi xro/nois. tou=to
to\ mu/qeuma ou) pa/nu ti pisto\n ei)=nai dokou=n e(te/ra 

tis e)pifa/neia qei/a genome/nh peri\ to\n a)/ndra qaumasth\
kai\ para/docos h(=tton a)pistei=sqai poiei=. kaqhme/nou
ga/r pot' au)tou= mesou/shs ma/lisq' h(me/ras e)n th=| pasta/di
tw=n basilei/wn kai\ katenexqe/ntos e)f' u(/pnon,
pu=r a)pe/lamyen e)pi\ th=s kefalh=s au)tou=, h(/ te mh/thr
au)tou= kai\ h( tou= basile/ws gunh\ poreuo/menai dia\ th=s
pasta/dos e)qea/santo kai\ pa/ntes o(/soi su\n tai=s gunaici\n
e)tu/gxanon to/te paro/ntes, kai\ me/xri tou/tou die/menen h(
flo\c o(/lhn au)tou= katala/mpousa th\n kefalh/n, e(/ws h(
mh/thr prosdramou=sa diane/sthsen au)to\n kai\ h( flo\c
a(/ma tw=| u(/pnw| diaskedasqei=sa h)fani/sqh. ta\ me\n dh\
peri\ tou= ge/nous au)tou= lego/mena toiau=t' e)sti/n.

a(\ de\ pro\ tou= basileu=sai diepra/cato lo/gou 
a)/cia, e)c w(=n *tarku/nio/s t' au)to\n h)ga/sqh kai\ o( *(rwmai/wn
dh=mos th=s meta\ basile/a timh=s h)ci/ou, toia/de.
a)nti/pais me\n w)\n e)/ti th=| prw/th| stratei/a|, h(\n e)pi\ *turrhnou\s
*tarku/nios e)stra/teusen, e)n toi=s i(ppeu=si tetagme/nos
ou(/tws e)/docen a)gwni/sasqai kalw=s, w(/ste peribo/htos
eu)qu\ gene/sqai kai\ ta)ristei=a prw=tos a(pa/ntwn
labei=n: e)/peiq' e(te/ras genome/nhs e)pi\ to\ au)to\ e)/qnos
stratei/as kai\ ma/xhs kartera=s peri\ po/lin *)/hrhton
a)ndreio/tatos a(pa/ntwn fanei\s stefa/nois au)=qis a)ristei/ois
u(po\ tou= basile/ws e)kosmei=to. e)/th de\ gegonw\s
ei)/kosi ma/lista th=s summaxikh=s strathgo\s a)pedei/xqh

duna/mews, h(\n *lati=noi e)/pemyan, kai\ sugkatekth/sato
basilei= *tarkuni/w| th\n tw=n *turrhnw=n a)rxh/n: e)/n te
tw=| pro\s *sabi/nous pole/mw| tw=| prw/tw| susta/nti tw=n
i(ppe/wn a)podeixqei\s h(gemw\n e)tre/yato tou\s tw=n polemi/wn
i(ppei=s kai\ me/xri po/lews *)ante/mnhs e)la/sas ta)ristei=a 
kai\ e)k tau/ths th=s ma/xhs e)/laben: e(te/ras te polla\s
pro\s to\ au)to\ e)/qnos a)gwnisa/menos ma/xas tote\ me\n
i(ppe/wn h(gou/menos, tote\ de\ pezw=n e)n a(pa/sais e)fa/nh
yuxh\n a)/ristos kai\ prw=tos e)stefanou=to tw=n a)/llwn.
kai\ e)peidh\ pare/sth *(rwmai/ois ei)s u(po/taci/n te kai\ para/dosin 
tw=n po/lewn to\ e)/qnos, ai)tiw/tatos ei)=nai do/cas
*tarkuni/w| kai\ tau/ths th=s dunastei/as toi=s e)piniki/ois
stefa/nois a)nedei=to u(p' au)tou=. h)=n de\ kai\ fronh=sai
ta\ politika\ sunetw/tatos kai\ lo/gw| ta\ bouleuqe/nta
e)cenegkei=n ou)deno\s xei/rwn a(pa/sais q' a(rmo/sai tai=s 
tu/xais kai\ panti\ sunecomoiwqh=nai prosw/pw| dunatw/tatos.
kai\ dia\ tau=ta *(rwmai=oi me\n au)to\n e)k tou= dh/mou 
metagagei=n h)ci/wsan ei)s tou\s patriki/ous yh=fon
e)pene/gkantes, w(/sper *tarku/nio/n te pro/teron kai\ e)/ti
pro\ tou/tou *no/man *pompi/lion: o( de\ basileu\s khdesth\n 
e)poih/sato th\n e(te/ran tw=n qugate/rwn e)gguh/sas,
kai\ pa/nq' o(/sa dia\ no/sous h)\ dia\ gh=ras a)du/natos h)=n
e)pitelei=n, di' e(autou= tou/tw| pra/ttein e)pe/skhpten, ou)
mo/non to\n i)/dion oi)=kon e)pitre/pwn, a)lla\ kai\ ta\ koina\
th=s po/lews dioikei=n a)ciw=n. e)n oi(=s a(/pasin e)chta/sqh 
pisto\s kai\ di/kaios, kai\ ou)de\n w)/|onto diafe/rein oi( dhmo/tai

*tarku/nion e)pimelei=sqai tw=n koinw=n h)\ *tu/llion:
ou(/tws e)ceqerapeu/qhsan u(p' au)tou= tai=s eu)ergesi/ais.

fu/sew/s te dh\ meteilhfw\s a)poxrw/ntws kateskeuasme/nhs
pro\s h(gemoni/an ou(=tos o( a)nh\r kai\ ta\s
para\ th=s tu/xhs polla\s kai\ mega/las e)sxhkw\s a)forma/s,
e)peidh\ teleuth=sai sune/bh *tarku/nion e)pibouleuqe/nta
u(po\ tw=n *)/agkou *marki/ou pai/dwn a)nasw/sasqai
th\n tou= patro\s a)rxh\n boulome/nwn, w(s e)n tw=| pro\
tou/tou dedh/lwka lo/gw|, do/cas u(po\ tw=n pragma/twn
au)tw=n e)pi\ th\n basilei/an kalei=sqai, drasth/rios a)nh\r
ou)k a)fh=ken e)k tw=n xeirw=n to\n kairo/n. h( de\ sugkataskeua/sasa
th\n h(gemoni/an au)tw=| kai\ pa/ntwn ai)ti/a genome/nh
tw=n a)gaqw=n h( tou= teteleuthko/tos basile/ws
h)=n gunh\ gambrw=| te sullamba/nousa i)di/w| kai\ e)k pollw=n
sunegnwkui=a qesfa/twn, o(/ti basileu=sai *(rwmai/wn
e)kei=non to\n a)/ndra ei(/marto. e)/tuxe d' au)th=| neani/as me\n 
ui(o\s ou) pro\ pollou= teteleuthkw\s xro/nou, paidi/a d' e)c
e)kei/nou du/o nh/pia kataleipo/mena. e)nqumoume/nh de\ th\n
peri\ to\n oi)=kon e)rhmi/an kai\ perideh\s ou)=sa, mh\ katasxo/ntes
oi( *ma/rkioi th\n a)rxh\n a)/rwntai ta\ paidi/a kai\
pa=san th\n basilikh\n sugge/neian a)fani/swsi, prw=ton
me\n e)pe/tace ta\s tw=n basilei/wn qu/ras klei=sai kai\
fu/lakas e)p' au)tai=s e)pe/sthse diakeleusame/nh mhde/na
parie/nai mh/t' e)/sw mh/t' e)/cw: e)/peit' e)k tou= dwmati/ou
pa/ntas e)celqei=n keleu/sasa tou\s a)/llous, e)n w(=| to\n

*tarku/nion h(miqnh=ta e)/qesan, th\n d' *)okrisi/an kai\
to\n *tu/llion kai\ th\n qugate/ra th\n sunoikou=san tw=|
*tulli/w| katasxou=sa kai\ ta\ paidi/a u(po\ tw=n trofw=n
e)nexqh=nai keleu/sasa le/gei pro\s au)tou/s: *tarku/nios me\n 
h(mi=n o( basileu/s, w)= *tu/llie, par' w(=| trofh=s kai\ paidei/as 
e)/tuxes, a(pa/ntwn ma/lista se\ timh/sas fi/lwn kai\
suggenw=n a)no/sia paqw\n e)kpeplh/rwke th\n e(autou= moi=ran
ou)/te peri\ tw=n i)di/wn pragma/twn diaqe/menos ou)de\n
ou)/te peri\ tw=n koinw=n kai\ politikw=n e)piskh/yas, a)ll'
ou)d' a)spa/sasqai/ tina h(mw=n kai\ prosagoreu=sai tou\s 
e)sxa/tous a)spasmou\s dunhqei/s. e)/rhma de\ kai\ o)rfana\
ta\ du/sthna tauti\ paidi/a katalei/petai ki/ndunon ou) to\n
e)la/xiston u(pe\r th=s yuxh=s tre/xonta: ei) ga\r e)pi\ *marki/ois
toi=s a)nelou=si to\n pa/ppon au)tw=n ta\ th=s po/lews
e)/stai pra/gmata, to\n oi)/ktiston a)polou=ntai tro/pon u(p' 
au)tw=n: e)/stai g' ou)d' u(mi=n a)sfalh\s o( bi/os, oi(=s e)neggu/hse
*tarku/nios ta\s e(autou= qugate/ras e)kei/nous u(peridw/n,
e)a\n oi( foneu/santes au)to\n th\n a)rxh\n kata/sxwsin,
ou)de\ toi=s a)/llois au)tou= fi/lois kai\ suggene/sin
ou)d' h(mi=n tai=s a)qli/ais gunaici/n: a)lla\ pa/ntas h(ma=s 
fanerw=s te kai\ kru/fa peira/sontai diole/sai. tau=t' 
ou)=n e)nqumoume/nous h(ma=s dei= mh\ periora=n tou\s e)kei=non
a)poktei/nantas a)/ndras a)nosi/ous kai\ pa=sin h(mi=n e)xqrou\s
tosau/thn a)rxh\n kthsame/nous, a)ll' e)nantiou=sqai kai\
kwlu/ein nu=n me\n a)pa/th| kai\ do/lw| xrhsame/nous: tou/twn 

ga\r e)n tw=| paro/nti dei=: o(/tan de\ ta\ prw=ta h(mi=n
xwrh/sh| kata\ nou=n, to/te kai\ e)k tou= fanerou= pa/sh|
duna/mei kai\ meq' o(/plwn au)toi=s o(mo/se xwrou=ntas, e)a\n
a)/ra kai\ tou/twn de/h|. a)ll' ou) deh/sei boulhqe/ntwn
 h(mw=n pra/ttein nu=n a(\ dei=. ti/na de\ tau=t' e)sti/; prw=ton
me\n kruptw/meqa to\n tou= basile/ws qa/naton kai\ pro\s
a(/pantas e)cenexqh=nai paraskeua/swmen, o(/ti plhgh\n ou)demi/an
e)/xei kai/rion, oi(/ t' i)atroi\ lege/twsan e)n o)li/gais
h(me/rais au)to\n a)podei/cein u(gih=: e)/peit' e)gw\ proelqou=sa
ei)s tou)mfane\s e)rw=n pro\s to\n o)/xlon, w(s dh\ *tarkuni/ou
moi tau=t' ei)pei=n e)piskh/yantos, o(/ti pa/ntwn a)podei/knusin
e)pimelhth\n kai\ fu/laka tw=n t' i)di/wn kai\ tw=n koinw=n,
e(/ws au)to\s e)k tw=n trauma/twn u(gih\s ge/nhtai, to\n
e(/teron tw=n e(autou= gambrw=n, to\ so\n ei)pou=sa, w)= *tu/llie,
o)/noma e)/stai d' ou)k a)/kousi *(rwmai/ois, a)lla\ boulome/nois
u(po\ sou= th\n po/lin e)pitropeu/esqai, u(f' ou(=
polla/kis h)/dh kai\ pro/teron e)petropeu/qh. o(/tan de\ to\n
paro/nta ki/ndunon diaskeda/swmen, ou)de\n ga\r e)/ti tw=n 
e)xqrw=n i)sxuro/n e)sti zh=n tou= basile/ws a)ggellome/nou,
paralabw\n su\ ta/s te r(a/bdous kai\ th\n tw=n o(/plwn
e)cousi/an ka/lei tou\s bouleu/santas a)poktei=nai *tarku/nion
e)pi\ to\n dh=mon a)po\ tw=n *marki/ou pai/dwn a)rca/menos
kai\ pro/qes au)toi=s di/kas: timwrhsa/menos de\
tou/tous a(/pantas, e)a\n me\n u(pomei/nwsi ta\s kri/seis, qana/tois,
e)a\n d' e)rh/mous a)fw=sin, o(\ ma=llon au)tou\s oi)=mai
poih/sein, a)eifugi/a| kai\ dhmeu/sei tw=n u(parxo/ntwn,

kaqi/stas' h)/dh ta\ peri\ th\n a)rxh\n o(mili/ais te filanqrw/pois
to\ plh=qos a)nalamba/nwn kai\ tou= mhde\n a)di/khma
gene/sqai pollh\n e)/xwn fronti/da kai\ tou\s a)po/rous
tw=n politw=n eu)ergesi/ais tisi\ kai\ dwreai=s u(pago/menos:
e)/peiq' o(/tan h(mi=n kairo\s ei)=nai dokh=|, to/te le/gwmen a)poteqnhke/nai 
*tarku/nion kai\ tafa\s au)tou= poiw=men a)po\ 
tou= fanerou=. di/kaios d' ei)=, *tu/llie, trafei/s q' u(f'
h(mw=n kai\ paideuqei\s kai\ pa/ntwn metesxhkw\s a)gaqw=n,
o(/swn para\ mhtro/s te kai\ patro\s ui(oi\ metalamba/nousi,
kai\ qugatri\ sunoikw=n h(mete/ra|, e)a\n dh\ kai\ basileu\s 
e)/ti ge/nh| *(rwmai/wn e)mou= kai\ ei)s tou=to/ soi sunagwnisame/nhs,
patro\s eu)/noian toi=s paidi/ois toi=s2de parasxe/sqai:
o(/tan d' ei)s a)/ndras e)/lqwsi kai\ ta\ koina\
pra/ttein i(kanoi\ ge/nwntai, to\n presbu/teron au)tw=n
a)podei=cai *(rwmai/wn h(gemo/na.

tau=t' ei)pou=sa kai\ tw=n paidi/wn e(ka/teron ei)s
ta\s a)gka/las e)mbalou=sa tou= te gambrou= kai\ th=s qugatro\s
kai\ polu\n e)c a)mfote/rwn kinh/sasa oi)=kton,
e)peidh\ kairo\s h)=n, e)ch=lqen e)k tou= dwmati/ou kai\ parh/ggeile
toi=s e)/ndon eu)treph= ta\ pro\s th\n qerapei/an 
e)pith/deia poiei=n kai\ tou\s i)atrou\s sugkalei=n. dialipou=sa
de\ th\n metacu\ nu/kta th=| kato/pin h(me/ra| pollou=
pro\s ta\ basi/leia sundramo/ntos o)/xlou proh=lqen ei)s
tou)mfane\s tai=s quri/sin e)pista=sa tai=s ferou/sais ei)s
to\n pro\ tw=n qurw=n stenwpo/n, kai\ prw=ton me\n e)dh/lwse 

toi=s parou=si tou\s bouleu/santas e)pi\ tw=| basilei=
to\n fo/non, kai\ tou\s e)pi\ tou)=rgon a)postale/ntas u(p'
au)tw=n dedeme/nous parh/gagen: e)/peiq' w(s ei)=de pollou\s: 
o)lofurome/nous te to\ pa/qos kai\ toi=s dedrako/sin
a)pexqome/nous, teleutw=sa ei)=pen ou)de\n au)toi=s e)k tw=n
a)nosi/wn e)pibouleuma/twn gegone/nai ou) dunhqei=sin a)poktei=nai
*tarku/nion. a)gaphtw=s de\ to\n lo/gon a(pa/ntwn
decame/nwn to/te to\n *tu/llion au)toi=s suni/sthsin w(s
u(po\ tou= basile/ws e)pi/tropon a(pa/ntwn tw=n t' i)di/wn
kai\ tw=n koinw=n a)podeiknu/menon, e(/ws au)to\s r(ai+/sh|.
o( me\n ou)=n dh=mos a)ph/|ei perixarh\s geno/menos, ei) mhde\n
pe/ponqen o( basileu\s deino/n, kai\ me/xri pollou= th\n
do/can e)/xwn tau/thn diete/lei. o( de\ *tu/llios i)sxura\n
xei=ra peri\ au(to\n e)/xwn kai\ tou\s r(abdou/xous e)pago/menos
tou\s basilikou\s proh=lqen ei)s th\n a)gora\n kai\
tou\s *marki/ous e)kh/rutten h(/kein u(fe/contas di/khn: w(s
d' ou)x u(ph/kouon, e)pikhru/cas au)toi=s a)i+di/ous fuga\s kai\
ta\s ou)si/as a)nalabw\n ei)s to\ dhmo/sion a)sfalw=s h)/dh
th\n *tarkuni/ou katei=xen a)rxh/n.

bou/lomai d' e)pisth/sas to\n e(ch=s lo/gon a)podou=nai
ta\s ai)ti/as, di' a(\s ou)/te *fabi/w| sugkateqe/mhn 
ou)/te toi=s a)/llois i(storikoi=s, o(/soi gra/fousin ui(ou\s
